explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the risk measurement of horticultural prices and the impact of financial access on price risk among farmers in West Java, Indonesia. The methodologies used include statistical analysis (25th percentile, coefficient of variation, independent t-test, and censored regression model) rather than any machine learning or deep learning techniques. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or their subfields are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
